page.title: 09Churches in our area.(contd)
page.content: are about 50 wooden pews but you can fit 3 or 4 people on it.There are 10 windows altogether,5 on each side. There are 4 wooden doors.The evening service used to start at 6pm but now it starts at 3.pm.It is about 16 metres long and 5 metres across. The Evangelical Church is made of brad stone. There are about 5 doors and about 14 windows.The doors are mostly made of wood but there is some glass in the doors.There is a brick wall round the church which acts as a boundary between the councils property and the churches.The gates are made of metal.We have an organ and a piano .From the school gates to the church it is 65 metres to the gate of the church.It measures 6 metres across and about 20 metres down. In Bishopstone there is only 1 Anglican and 1 disused Methodist Church.
